trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：你可以将另一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。如果你如此作，则铁木尔剑齿虎获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Name
PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mutate {2}{B/R}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
trans-unit.target: 合变{2}{B/R}{W}{W}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）

trans-unit.resname: PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Text: Paragraph 2
PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature mutates, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当此生物合变时，它向目标由对手操控的生物或鹏洛客造成4点伤害，且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: PL22·4 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Name
PL22·4 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 指挥官忍术{U}{B}（{U}{B}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上或统帅区横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: PL22·4 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的忍者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。每位对手各失去等同于该牌法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: PL22·5 | Herald's Horn | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于传令号角进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: PL22·5 | Herald's Horn | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的该类别生物咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: PL22·5 | Herald's Horn | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若它是该类别的生物牌，则你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。
